content: I'll definitely consider those recommendations. I've been wanting to add some live plants to my tank for a while now, and I think they'll not only help with algae control but also provide a more natural environment for my fish. I've already had some success with the Java Moss and Anacharis I added around March 1st, so I'm hoping to expand on that. Do you have any tips on how to care for live plants in an aquarium?
